title: 'Good general purpose scissor'
body: 'Even though it is manufactured by a tool company
column5: this is a general purpose scissor. The competitor it has (and that I also own) is the 3M scissor 8in. This one is 10in
column6: so it makes straighter long cuts easier than my 8in 3M. The handles are hard plastic
column7: no soft inserts or special contouring like the 3M scissors which feel very comfortable. The 3M has been in my household for a few years now and still going strong - blades are sharp and no broken handles; I am expecting the same from this DeWalt.'

title: 'Definitely worth having'
body: It is longer than you think but is comfortable to use. Always have a different pair of scissors for specific tasks I say and this one serves me right where larger scissors are needed. It will definitely get most household jobs done anyway.  My only gripe is that the scissors don't feel very tight and it cannot really be adjusted when it becomes loose over the years. It will be an excellent pair but for this shortcoming. Still, maybe not all are this way.

title: 'Seller fooling ppl about its price'
body: 'the scissor is nice.. very big in size.. but the MRP of the scissor printed on the cover is 234/- .and the seller is actually fooling ppl by posting a price of 290/- odd and then giving a discount of 20%.. if u buy this scissor at 234/-u r buying it at its mrp and not discounted price... Amazon shud look into this.. .seller misquote the price n then offer discount..regarding the scissors... i will review it after using it thoroughly...'
